name: artisan-craft-tests
description: Test suite per l'e-commerce Artisan Craft

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:integration
scripts.report: npm run report:jest && npm run report:playwright
scripts.test:ci: npm run test && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:compatibility && npm run test:performance
scripts.docker:test:backend: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-runner -- npm run test:backend
scripts.docker:test:frontend: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-runner -- npm run test:frontend
scripts.docker:test:integration: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-runner -- npm run test:integration
scripts.docker:test:e2e: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-runner -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.docker:test:compatibility: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-runner -- npm run test:compatibility
scripts.docker:test:performance: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-runner -- npm run test:performance

author: Team Artisan Craft
